General.Name: Shenmao Technology Inc
General.Description: Shenmao Technology Inc. manufactures and sells solder materials in the Taiwan, Mainland China, Thailand, Malaysia, and internationally. It offers SMT assembly materials, including tin lead, lead-free, water soluble, package on package, low temperature, and halogen free solder pastes, as well as adhesives; and semiconductor packaging materials, such as BGA spheres and bumping solder pastes. The company also provides wave solder assembly products comprising solder bars, cored solder wires, lead free solder wires, and halogens free solder wires; liquid fluxes; solder preforms and ribbons; and PV ribbons. It serves manufacturers of electronic computers, network communications, and consumer electronic products. Shenmao Technology Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: NO. 12-1 Gongye 2nd Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 328
